backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with types and state for evidence, sessions, appeals, loss profiles, subscriptions, user access, and profile queries with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Lists evidence‑related frontend features, associated files, components, and test IDs for build planning.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files including hooks, components, utilities, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root container, metadata, icons, and script loader.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, colors, and icon assets.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack router and main route structure, including auth‑based root and all page routes.
frontend/src/components/AdminGate.tsx: UI gate that checks authentication and admin status before allowing access to protected admin content.
frontend/src/components/appeal/AppealEdi: Editor para revisar e alterar texto de recurso gerado, com opção de download e envio por e-mail.
frontend/src/components/appeal/AppealWiz: Wizard de quatro etapas para gerar um recurso, incluindo plataforma, motivo, explicação e evidências.
frontend/src/components/appeal/EvidenceP: Lista evidências cadastradas permitindo seleção múltipla, com carregamento e mensagens de vazio.
frontend/src/components/appeal/SendViaEm: Gera e abre link mailto com o recurso e exibe aviso sobre anexos manuais necessários.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout principal com navegação lateral responsiva, itens condicionais por autenticação e acesso rápido, incluindo suporte a admins.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Protege rotas exibindo alerta e botão de login quando o usuário não está autenticado.
frontend/src/components/collective/Colle: UI component providing dropdown filters for platform, reason, region, and time period.
Dialog prompting users to share anonymous report data, collecting region and neighborhood before submission.
frontend/src/components/collective/Platf: Displays a bar chart of report counts by platform with optional filters and time window.
frontend/src/components/collective/Reaso: Shows a vertical bar chart summarizing report counts by reason with applied filters.
frontend/src/components/collective/Trend: Renders a daily line chart of report trends over a selected period with filtering.
frontend/src/components/evidence/Evidenc: Provides dropdown filters for narrowing evidence items by type and platform.
Toolbar for selecting evidence items and exporting selected files as a ZIP.
Displays a filterable evidence timeline with selectable cards and image previews. Fetches evidence data, handles selection, and navigates to evidence details.
Form for uploading new evidence with type, platform, region, and notes, then storing the image in IndexedDB. Uses a mutation to create evidence entries.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Botão de login/logout que gerencia estado de autenticação e trata erros comuns de sessão.
frontend/src/components/loss/LossProfile: Form to view and edit loss profile settings including earnings, workdays, platform, and deactivation date. Saves the updated profile via mutation.
frontend/src/components/loss/LossProject: Renders a bar chart showing 30, 60, and 90‑day loss projections based on the user’s loss profile. Uses Recharts for visualization.
frontend/src/components/loss/LossReportA: Provides buttons to download or share a text-based loss report generated from the user's profile. Handles browser share API fallback logic.
frontend/src/components/loss/LossResults: Shows summary cards for weekly, monthly, accumulated, and 90‑day projected losses. Formats values as BRL currency.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Market: Marketing banner highlighting supported platforms and app benefits. Includes responsive imagery, badges, and benefit cards.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal exibido para novos usuários coletarem nome e email e salvar o perfil inicial.
frontend/src/components/sessions/WorkSes: UI for starting and ending work sessions, selecting city, and periodically logging weather data.
Displays a list of past work sessions with timestamps, weather sample count, and navigation on click.
Wraps session controls and session history list, managing the active session state.
frontend/src/components/subscription/Fea: Gates content based on subscription status and shows upgrade prompts when access is blocked.
frontend/src/components/trust/TrustBadge: Shows a set of trust and security badges for UI reassurance.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides hooks for admin actions such as listing users and blocking or unblocking them.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppeals.ts: Hooks for generating appeals and fetching individual or user-specific appeal records.
Hooks for submitting and retrieving collective reports from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Returns current user identity info and logout capability from Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvidence.ts: Hooks for creating evidence, fetching evidence by ID, listing all evidence, and retrieving timeline data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, loading stored identities, and tracking login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Fetches whether the current caller is an admin using the actor and react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useLossProfile.ts: Queries and mutates the caller's loss profile via the actor, with invalidation on updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Retrieves the 'reviso motivada' message from the backend using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubscription.ts: Handles subscription status fetching, entitlement evaluation, and plan upgrades with react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Loads and saves the caller's user profile, exposing loading states and invalidating queries on save.
frontend/src/hooks/useWorkSessions.ts: Creates, updates, and fetches work sessions and weather samples, with related query invalidations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining color variables, dark mode overrides, and base styling.
frontend/src/lib/collectiveOptions.ts: Maps regions to neighborhood lists and provides a lookup function.
frontend/src/lib/evidenceIndexedDb.ts: Manages storing and retrieving evidence images in IndexedDB and exposes a hook to load them as object URLs.
frontend/src/lib/lossCalculations.ts: Calculates weekly, monthly, accumulated, and projected financial losses based on a loss profile.
frontend/src/lib/mailto.ts: Builds mailto links for different platforms with predefined subjects and body text.
Stores, retrieves, and clears the selected subscription plan in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/lib/pdfReport.ts: Generates a text-based financial loss report as a Blob or downloadable file.
frontend/src/lib/subscriptions/plans.ts: Defines subscription plan metadata and provides a lookup by plan ID.
frontend/src/lib/subscriptions/rules.ts: Evaluates subscription entitlement status and formats expiry dates.
frontend/src/lib/weatherClient.ts: Fetches weather data from OpenWeatherMap and maps conditions to internal enums with fallback handling.
frontend/src/lib/zipExport.ts: Generates and downloads a manifest JSON and associated evidence images using IndexedDB data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard for viewing users, filtering them, and blocking or unblocking accounts with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/AppealGeneratorPage.t: Form for selecting platform, reason, evidence, and text to generate an appeal using backend hooks.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Displays plan checkout flow, payment methods, and triggers subscription upgrade processing.
frontend/src/pages/CollectiveInsightsPag: Shows collective statistics with filters and charts based on anonymized deactivation data.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard with quick-access shortcuts and modules for evidence, calculator, appeals, and collective data.
frontend/src/pages/DataPolicyPage.tsx: Renders a scrollable data policy page detailing principles, legal bases, data categories, and purposes of data processing.
frontend/src/pages/EvidenceDetailPage.ts: Displays detailed information for a specific evidence item, including image, upload date, platform, and notes.
frontend/src/pages/EvidenceTrackerPage.t: Provides tabs for uploading evidence and managing work sessions behind an authentication gate.
frontend/src/pages/LossCalculatorPage.ts: Shows a loss calculation form and, if available, results, charts, and report actions for financial loss estimates.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentsPage.tsx: Lists payment methods and directs users to plan selection, with trust badges and important payment notes.
frontend/src/pages/PlansBillingPage.tsx: Displays available subscription plans, highlights the popular option, and allows selecting a plan for checkout.
frontend/src/pages/PlansDashboardPage.ts: Shows the user's current subscription status and expiration, and provides a comparison of all available plans.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders the app's privacy policy with scrollable sections detailing data collection, usage, security, and sharing. Uses cards and headings to display static informational content.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Provides a user profile form that loads, edits, and saves name and email through hooks. Displays Internet Identity info and handles validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/PublicOverviewPage.ts: Shows the public marketing overview with key feature cards, CTA buttons, a banner, and security highlights. Aimed at presenting product capabilities to non-logged users.
frontend/src/pages/QuickProcessLookupPag: Displays a form to search processes by number and shows an alert indicating the feature is under development. Includes a future-features section listing planned capabilities.
frontend/src/pages/WorkSessionDetailPage: Loads and displays detailed information about a work session, including timestamps, city, weather, and duration. Handles loading, not-found states, and navigation back.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for retrieving, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters. Supports both query-string and hash-based routing with persistence in sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state file describing app vision, architecture, payment requirements, features, and image needs for the ROTAS E DIREITOS app.
